Text: Dras War Memorial:  The memorial is located about 5 km from the city centre across the Tiger Hill.

Text: Dras War Memorial:  It is located on the Srinagar-Leh National Highway 1D.

6:
--------------------
Text: Dras War Memorial:  Kargil Vijay Diwas is celebrated on 26 July every year at the memorial simultaneously the Prime Minister of India pays tribute to the soldiers at Amar Jawan Jyothi at the India Gate, New Delhi.
Triplets:<Dras War Memorial
7:
--------------------
Text: Dras War Memorial: The main attraction of the whole memorial is the Sandstone wall, in the open, which has the names of all the Indian army personnel, who laid their lives during the Kargil war besides there is also a souvenir shop.
Triplets:<Dras War Memorial
8:
--------------------
Text: Dras War Memorial:  Visitors to the memorial can also see from there, some of the peaks that the Indian army captured back from Pakistan.
